title: Kiss Person Man Medium Dark Skin Tone

adjectives: Romantic gestures are often tender and loving.
verbs: Couples often kiss to show their deep affection.
nouns: Love and romance are commonly associated with this emoji.

description: A couple, a man and a woman, kissing. Often used to express love, romance, or affection between partners.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss person emoji for a man with medium-dark skin tone portrays a tender, closed-mouth kiss gesture with rosy cheeks, characteristic of Apple's expressive facial renderings. The smooth, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading give it a warm, affectionate appearance. This emoji is a sweet and intimate way to convey love, affection, or a gentle farewell in digital conversations.
